BR_text.BRsummary: Regression: "Retry link" to yarn application attempts is missing
BR_text.BRdescription:
in Previous versions:
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39592018/55371566-3dcb4180-5531-11e9-9790-d51567e52997.png></denchmark-link>
 
 the link will link to a yarn cluster with all the previous attempts log: <denchmark-link:http://host/yarn/10.1.0.4:8088/cluster>http://host/yarn/10.1.0.4:8088/cluster</denchmark-link>
 
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39592018/55371625-7539ee00-5531-11e9-8297-c598ab5ff016.png></denchmark-link>
 
 in v0.11.0 detail page, the link is missing:
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39592018/55371661-926ebc80-5531-11e9-9a74-574c478ed612.png></denchmark-link>

comments_0.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mzmssg>@mzmssg</denchmark-link>
  - please list this as known issue of v0.11.0, this is currently planned to Mid April Release.
